description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.QsCRXffpsDoMvPnT]{Basic Mods}

Your drone has a camera that you can see through using your custom rig as long as your drone is within range. The camera has ordinary sight, and is capable of seeing whatever an ordinary @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.AMBcyDZDtJ1OOzh3]{Human} could see. The camera can also record up to 1 hour of footage, which can be downloaded and viewed using your custom rig.
